short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's add AI translation subtitles to streaming video conference footage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It allows you to add translated subtitles to video conference footage.

You can install this Chrome extension and use it as soon as you register for LINGUACODE.AI by Alt Inc.
To register, please visit https://linguacode.ai

There is no charge for this service.

Function Overview
It translates your words in real-time and displays them as subtitles on the video in a video conference using Zoom, Teams, Google Meet and more.
It supports translation of about 30 languages.
You can easily switch the translation language even in the middle of a meeting.

It will play an active role in global meetings.

Version 1.0.1 : Minor bug fixed.
Version 1.0.0 : Initial release.
